profile:
**21 YEARS EXPERIENCED TAPING, DRYWALL, FRAMING, PAINTING & RENOVATIONS SERVICING**

- Free Estimation 
- Complete taping, mudding and sanding services 
- Renovations in basements, upper/lower floors, storage rooms, etc 
- Stucco ceiling removal 
- Smooth ceiling 
-Level 5 finishing 
- All touch-ups including cracks and small patches 
- Renovations including tearing down drywall and putting new drywall and taping work
-Painting 
- Framing 
-Commercial Work

There's no job too big or small for us

Guaranteed Satisfaction.

References available upon request.

Call for a free estimation, I can gladly come to your home and provide a cost-free in-home estimation

Romildo Da Silva serving the GTA AREA

(416) 996-1972

profile:
Welcome to Drywallers.ca! Known as Marjo and Company until 2014, Drywallers.ca originated as Mark and Joanne Beattie in 1986. At the time, both pushed pink insulation every day and made sure there was always work, food, and smiles.  Operating one the principles of honesty, trust, and reliability - the small business began to grow. It didn't take long for Mark to establish a reputation of sincerity and hard work in Simcoe County. Today, Mark and Kyle manage the crews together and continue to grow Drywallers.ca Inc into a fun, welcoming, and exciting place of work. With a focus on learning, safety, and top quality, the values of a small "Mom and Pop Shop" are the building blocks of our business.
 
We look forward to working with you.
services: steel stud framing acoustical drop ceilings taping texture removal and knockdown ceiling basement renovations and new builds

profile:
Patchmaster is dedicated to providing Professional small same day drywall/plaster repairs,
Dings and Dents, Nail Pops, Scratches or Gouges, Ceiling Repairs, Texture Matching, Painting Repairs.
We also do the repairs the Pro's don't want to such as Plumbers/Electricians/HVAC and Carpenters/Handyman.
Flood damaged basements(Flood Cut)
